page.title: 18 TURF AND TRAVEL
page.content:
Turf and Travel was a large building which is filled with a massive selection of items to do with horses. The man inside didn't tell us his name but he was extremely nice and told us many different things.All the saddles are hand made.The building used to be a farm. Turf and Travel have been in business for about two years.They have a cross-country course with fourteen jumps and they also hold Dressage Competitions for pony clubs and other small organizations.Although the shop is to do with horses they actually only keep livestock and have facilities which include calf rearing pens.
By Caroline Harvey
